# Actor Reset
<!--
@name: Actor Reset
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Reset all properties of one or all the actor
## Parameters


- **index**: Index of the Actor. If "*" is used, all the actors will been reseted.
--Actor Reset (1)
--Actor Reset ("magic")
--Actor Reset ("\*")
---
